name: European Electronics Recyclers Association
goal:
EERA's objectives include gaining influence at EU-level for the common good of the recycling industry and on following and responding to issues that are under discussion at national and international level.

EERA channels the view of the members to the European Commission, the European Parliament, Governments, Authorities, the Electronic and Electrical Industry and other stakeholders in the WEEE recycling chain.

Important activities of the association are the dissemination of publications, documents and studies of common interest, the organization of gatherings for the exchange of information and informing the public and relevant organizations.
euInitiatives:
Cenelec workinggroups:EN standards, EC stakeholder meeting groups related to WEEE related topics
